plugins.name: digital-marketing-pro
plugins.description: Comprehensive digital marketing execution system with 25 specialist agents, 16 integrated modules, 115 slash commands, 67 MCP integrations, agency operations, multilingual support, and quality assurance layer. Covers SEO, AEO, GEO, content marketing, paid ads, social media, email marketing, CRM, analytics, brand strategy, influencer marketing, and more.

plugins.name: contentforge
plugins.description: Enterprise multi-agent content production with batch processing (4-5x faster), content refresh, multilingual support (15+ languages), platform integrations (WordPress/Notion/Webflow/HubSpot), and analytics. Transform requirements into publication-ready content in 20-30 minutes through 9-phase autonomous pipeline. Features: zero hallucinations (three-layer verification), Phase 6.5 Humanizer, 5-dimension quality scoring, A/B testing, video scripts, social adaptation.
